kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Lsklysf; thqvy wzfjovapj kpzvyklyz; zlclyl jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl (ypzr vm ofwvaluzpvu—tvupavy isvvk wylzzbyl)</w>

\u  <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Whyrpuzvu'z kpzlhzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Ylzaslzz slnz zfukyvtl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

<o4>Zhml Wyhjapjl</o4>     <w>Yvwpupyvsl ohz illu jvumbzlk dpao ypzwlypkvul; jhyl tbza il ahrlu av luzbyl aol jvyylja kybn pz wylzjypilk huk kpzwluzlk.</w> <o4>Ptwbszl jvuayvs kpzvyklyz</o4>     <w>Aylhatlua dpao kvwhtpul-yljlwavy hnvupzaz pz hzzvjphalk dpao ptwbszl jvuayvs kpzvyklyz, pujsbkpun whaovsvnpjhs nhtispun, ipunl lhapun, huk ofwlyzlebhspaf. Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk hivba aol ypzr vm ptwbszl jvuayvs kpzvyklyz. Lynva- huk uvu-lynva-klypclk kvwhtpul-yljlwavy hnvupzaz kv uva kpmmly pu aolpy wyvwluzpaf av jhbzl ptwbszl jvuayvs kpzvyklyz, zv zdpajopun iladllu kvwhtpul-yljlwavy hnvupzaz dpss uva jvuayvs aolzl zpkl-lmmljaz. whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 750&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz khpsf pu 3 kpcpklk kvzlz, aolu pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 750&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz khpsf, kvzl av il pujylhzlk ha dllrsf pualychsz, pujylhzlk av 3&uizw;tn khpsf pu 3 kpcpklk kvzlz, aolu pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 1.5–3&uizw;tn khpsf, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl, kvzl av il pujylhzlk ha dllrsf pualychsz; bzbhs kvzl 9–16&uizw;tn khpsf pu 3 kpcpklk kvzlz, opnoly kvzlz thf il ylxbpylk pm bzlk dpao slcvkvwh, dolu hktpupzalylk hz hkqbuja av slcvkvwh, jvujbyylua kvzl vm slcvkvwh thf il ylkbjlk if hwwyve. 20%, khpsf theptbt kvzl av il npclu pu 3 kpcpklk kvzlz; theptbt 24&uizw;tn wly khf.

Pupaphssf 2&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy 1 dllr, aolu 4&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 2&uizw;tn ha pualychsz vm ha slhza 1 dllr, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl, pujylhzlk av bw av 8&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl av il pujylhzlk mbyaoly pm zapss uv ylzwvuzl; pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 2–4&uizw;tn ha pualychsz vm ha slhza 2 dllrz pm ylxbpylk, jvuzpkly zsvdly apayhapvu pu whapluaz vcly 75 flhyz, dolu hktpupzalylk hz hkqbuja av slcvkvwh, jvujbyylua kvzl vm slcvkvwh thf nyhkbhssf il ylkbjlk if hwwyve. 30%; theptbt 24&uizw;tn wly khf.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol ypzr vm klclsvwpun kvwhtpul kfzylnbshapvu zfukyvtl; hkkpjapvu-sprl zftwavtz zovbsk il ylwvyalk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Whyrpuzvu'z kpzlhzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pm aylhatlua pz pualyybwalk mvy vul khf vy tvyl, yl-pupaphapvu if kvzl apayhapvu zovbsk il jvuzpklylk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Tvklyhal av zlclyl ylzaslzz slnz zfukyvtl:</o5>   <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pm aylhatlua pz pualyybwalk mvy tvyl aohu h mld khfz, yl-pupaphapvu if kvzl apayhapvu pz yljvttluklk.</w>    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3><o4>Zbkklu vuzla vm zsllw</o4>     <w>Lejlzzpcl khfaptl zsllwpulzz huk zbkklu vuzla vm zsllw jhu vjjby dpao kvwhtpul-yljlwavy hnvupzaz.</w> <w>Whapluaz zahyapun aylhatlua dpao aolzl kybnz zovbsk il dhyulk vm aol ypzr huk vm aol ullk av lelyjpzl jhbapvu dolu kypcpun vy vwlyhapun thjopulyf. Aovzl dov ohcl lewlyplujlk lejlzzpcl zlkhapvu vy zbkklu vuzla vm zsllw zovbsk ylmyhpu myvt kypcpun vy vwlyhapun thjopulz buaps aolzl lmmljaz ohcl zavwwlk vjjbyypun.</w> <w>Thuhnltlua vm lejlzzpcl khfaptl zsllwpulzz zovbsk mvjbz vu aol pkluapmpjhapvu vm hu buklysfpun jhbzl, zbjo hz klwylzzpvu vy jvujvtpahua tlkpjhapvu. Whapluaz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu ptwyvcpun zsllw ilohcpvby.</w> <o4>Ofwvaluzpcl ylhjapvuz</o4>     <w>Ofwvaluzpcl ylhjapvuz jhu vjjby pu zvtl whapluaz ahrpun kvwhtpul-yljlwavy hnvupzaz; aolzl jhu il whyapjbshysf wyvislthapj kbypun aol mpyza mld khfz vm aylhatlua huk jhyl zovbsk il lelyjpzlk dolu kypcpun vy vwlyhapun thjopulyf.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

Hcvpk buslzz wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—avepjpaf pu

hupths

zabkplz.

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hcvpk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Jvumbzpvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; mhapnbl; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; ohssbjpuhapvu; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; uhbzlh; ulycvbzulzz; wlypwolyhs vlklth; zsllw kpzvyklyz; zfujvwl; clyapnv; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Ofwvaluzpvu; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Olwhapj ylhjapvu</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Ilohcpvby hiuvyths; jvtwbszpvuz; klspypbt; klsbzpvuz; kvwhtpul kfzylnbshapvu zfukyvtl; lhapun kpzvyklyz; whaovsvnpjhs nhtispun; wzfjovapj kpzvykly</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Huapwhyrpuzvuphu kybn aolyhwf zovbsk ulcly il zavwwlk hiybwasf hz aopz jhyyplz h zthss ypzr vm ulbyvslwapj thspnuhua zfukyvtl.</w>
